name: Bean Farmer Pinball
description:
In a dusty corner of the app store lay an old pinball table, clunky, but still working fine.

Introducing Bean Farmer Pinball, a pinball game inspired by the days of the 70's pinball era. It's simple, uncluttered and fun! This is the first from the Hip Pocket Pinball Series.

This game was made for those who remember and love the days of old school pinball, milk bars, and hamburgers with the lot.

And with a cool theme based on Bean Farming, why wouldn't all the kids be lining up for a turn?
